m_szDocSumamry: SEIA Calls On Obama To Revaluate Investment Tax Credit Phase Out March 12th, 2014 by Adam Johnston   Suggestions of ending the Investment Tax Credit (ITC) for US solar energy projects has the industry’s top official wanting the White House to revise its position. President Barack Obama released last week in his 2015 fiscal year budget the phase-out of the ITC by December 31, 2016. In its place is the less lucrative Production Tax Credit (PTC).
